00015 EagleWorker* EagleWorker_New(int workerId, struct EagleInstance *instance)
00016 {
00017     EagleWorker *worker = (EagleWorker*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleWorker_New.1", sizeof(EagleWorker));
00018     if(NULL == worker) {
00019         return NULL;
00020     }
00021     
00022     worker->workerId = workerId;
00023     worker->instance = instance;
00024     worker->lockTime = 0;
00025     
00026     return worker;
00027 }

00029 void EagleWorker_runJobLiteral_(EaglePlanJob *job, EaglePlanOperation *epo)
00030 {
00031     EaglePage *destination = NULL, *source1 = NULL;
00032     EagleDbSqlValue *value;
00033     
00034     /* prepare arguments */
00035     if(epo->destination >= 0) {
00036         if(epo->destination >= job->plan->buffersNeeded) {
00037             char msg[1024];
00038             sprintf(msg, "destination %d is greater than allowed %d buffers!", epo->destination, job->plan->buffersNeeded);
00039             EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, msg);
00040             return;
00041         }
00042         destination = job->buffers[epo->destination];
00043     }
00044     if(epo->source1 >= 0) {
00045         if(epo->source1 >= job->plan->buffersNeeded) {
00046             char msg[1024];
00047             sprintf(msg, "source1 %d is greater than allowed %d buffers!", epo->source1, job->plan->buffersNeeded);
00048             EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, msg);
00049             return;
00050         }
00051         source1 = job->buffers[epo->source1];
00052     }
00053     
00054     /* execute page operation */
00055     value = (EagleDbSqlValue*) epo->obj;
00056     switch(value->type) {
00057             
00058         case EagleDbSqlValueTypeAsterisk:
00059         case EagleDbSqlValueTypeIdentifier:
00060             /* these are bogus and should never occur */
00061             break;
00062             
00063         case EagleDbSqlValueTypeFloat:
00064             epo->function(destination, source1, NULL, &value->value.floatValue);
00065             break;
00066             
00067         case EagleDbSqlValueTypeInteger:
00068             epo->function(destination, source1, NULL, &value->value.intValue);
00069             break;
00070             
00071         case EagleDbSqlValueTypeString:
00072             epo->function(destination, source1, NULL, &value->value.identifier);
00073             break;
00074             
00075     }
00076 }

00078 void EagleWorker_runJobPage_(EaglePlanJob *job, EaglePlanOperation *epo)
00079 {
00080     EaglePage *destination = NULL, *source1 = NULL, *source2 = NULL;
00081     
00082     /* prepare arguments */
00083     if(epo->destination >= 0) {
00084         if(epo->destination >= job->plan->buffersNeeded) {
00085             char msg[1024];
00086             sprintf(msg, "destination %d is greater than allowed %d buffers!", epo->destination, job->plan->buffersNeeded);
00087             EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, msg);
00088             return;
00089         }
00090         destination = job->buffers[epo->destination];
00091     }
00092     if(epo->source1 >= 0) {
00093         if(epo->source1 >= job->plan->buffersNeeded) {
00094             char msg[1024];
00095             sprintf(msg, "source1 %d is greater than allowed %d buffers!", epo->source1, job->plan->buffersNeeded);
00096             EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, msg);
00097             return;
00098         }
00099         source1 = job->buffers[epo->source1];
00100     }
00101     if(epo->source2 >= 0) {
00102         if(epo->source2 >= job->plan->buffersNeeded) {
00103             char msg[1024];
00104             sprintf(msg, "source2 %d is greater than allowed %d buffers!", epo->source2, job->plan->buffersNeeded);
00105             EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, msg);
00106             return;
00107         }
00108         source2 = job->buffers[epo->source2];
00109     }
00110     
00111     /* execute page operation */
00112     epo->function(destination, source1, source2, epo->obj);
00113 }

00115 void EagleWorker_runJob(EaglePlanJob *job)
00116 {
00117     EagleLinkedList_Foreach(job->plan->operations, EaglePlanOperation*, epo)
00118     {
00119         switch(epo->type) {
00120                 
00121             case EaglePlanOperationTypePage:
00122                 EagleWorker_runJobPage_(job, epo);
00123                 break;
00124                 
00125             case EaglePlanOperationTypeLiteral:
00126                 EagleWorker_runJobLiteral_(job, epo);
00127                 break;
00128                 
00129         }
00130         
00131     }
00132     EagleLinkedList_ForeachEnd
00133 }

00135 void* EagleWorker_begin(void *obj)
00136 {
00137     EagleWorker *worker = (EagleWorker*) obj;
00138     EagleWorker_SetForCurrentThread(worker);
00139     
00140     while(1) {
00141         EaglePlanJob *job = NULL;
00142         uint64_t start;
00143         
00144         /* start the timers at zero */
00145         start = EagleUtils_GetAbsoluteTime();
00146         worker->lockTime = 0;
00147         
00148         /* ask the instance for the next job */
00149         job = EagleInstance_nextJob(worker->instance, worker->workerId);
00150         
00151         /* run the job is one is returned */
00152         if(NULL != job) {
00153             /* is this the start of the plan itself? */
00154             if(0 == job->plan->startTime) {
00155                 job->plan->startTime = start;
00156             }
00157                 
00158             /* run operations */
00159             EagleWorker_runJob(job);
00160             
00161             /* add time */
00162             job->plan->executionTime[worker->workerId] += EagleUtils_GetAbsoluteTime() - start;
00163             job->plan->lockTime[worker->workerId] += worker->lockTime;
00164             
00165             /* free */
00166             EaglePlanJob_Delete(job);
00167         }
00168         else {
00169             return NULL;
00170         }
00171     }
00172     
00173     return NULL;
00174 }
00175 
00176 void EagleWorker_start(EagleWorker *worker)
00177 {
00178     pthread_create(&worker->thread, NULL, EagleWorker_begin, worker);
00179 }
00180 
00181 void EagleWorker_join(EagleWorker *worker)
00182 {
00183     pthread_join(worker->thread, NULL);
00184 }

00186 void EagleWorker_Delete(EagleWorker *worker)
00187 {
00188     if(NULL == worker) {
00189         return;
00190     }
00191     
00192     EagleMemory_Free(worker);
00193 }

00195 EagleWorker* EagleWorker_GetForCurrentThread(void)
00196 {
00197     return EagleWorker_ThisWorker;
00198 }

00200 void EagleWorker_SetForCurrentThread(EagleWorker *worker)
00201 {
00202     EagleWorker_ThisWorker = worker;
